title: looking for FONT
content:
Hi there to everybody  
I am in need of a font that look's like the attached picture.  
If you know what it is or have the font then we can make a swop.

So let me know what and when and where .

Thanking you

shaun

[info@dvdesign.biz](mailto:info@dvdesign.biz)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824184807im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tooth%20man%20e-mail_3715.jpg)
author: vinylman

comments.content:
House Brush, by House Industries is close.

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=23&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824184807/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=23&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=23&subpage=viewfonts")

JH

Hi there to everybody who helped me a very big thank you.

found the font name but now i need to get it but as in south africa, it is not easy to buy fonts from here.  
Where can i down load it from the net for nothing as for the peice they are asking it is seven times te price for us. 1 dollar is R 7 Rand for us here.

So if anybody can help me with the font CHURCHWARD BRUSH ITALIC which is the best i have seen so far.  
Please mail me at [info@dvdesign.biz](mailto:info@dvdesign.biz)

thanking you  
shaun

If you don't have any budget, you may 'want' (or have) to turn to free fonts instead. (You may find an alternate at DaFont's 'Brush' section: dafont.com/theme.php?cat=604.)

Dav

thanks to everybody who is trying.  
from  
shaun  
 [info@dvdesign.biz](mailto:info@dvdesign.biz)

It is a problem that the font is expensive for you, due to exchange rates/economic climate etc., but this is really the wrong place to ask "Where can i down load it from the net for nothing", as most people (I assume) on this forum are against the illegal distribution of 'pay' fonts. As Formlos says, your best option is to go for a legitimately free font that comes close.

Good luck.

JH

thanks to everybody  
I have found some thing very close that we can use.

<cite> It is a problem that the font is expensive for you, due to exchange rates/economic climate etc. </cite>  
Yes, really bad, this said from a person from one of the lead countries where piracy is the norm (Italy), while it could be effectively fought… :=(  
One day I'll have to start a thread on this…
